title: Budget friendly
text: The location is excellent, easy access to the mall through hotel with key card, beautiful pool area, clean rooms with microwave and refrigerator. I love the strict security/safety measures, and most importantly, it's budget friendly.

title: The staff are great, so is the place.
text: we stayed from 2- 8th January 2020. All the front desk staff were very helpful and friendly. the hotel is always clean and lovely, great location, there are restaurants around and its close to the mall, there's a bank in the mall that have currency exchange without tax. the rooms were cleaned daily so were towel changes and bed making. easy access to buses when you want to go to downtown.

title: Startlingly impressive
text: My trip to the blue lagoon was on Tuesday January 7, 2020. great feeling, you must feel it to understand how awesome it is. the temperature of the water is perfect, it's a must see/feel when you visit Iceland. it's worth all the fuse, musk, dink, and towel comes with the comfort entry fee (pre-book), I wouldn't go for the premium, it makes no difference, you don't need a pair of slippers, you can go bare footed and the towel is just fine. the feel of the water is what you don't wanna miss.

title: Magnificent
text: Our tour was on Monday January 6, 2020. very impressive and highly recommended tour if you ever visit Iceland. we had a great tour guard, Pade, he was very nice and patient . the whole experience was awesome from the waterfall, gorgeous black beach, breathtaking glacier hike, and LAVA. even the rain wasn't gonna mess the day up for us.
place: South Coast: Glacier Hike, LAVA Centre, Waterfalls & Black Sand Beach

title: It was ok
text: I actually booked air Canada from laguardia but flight was delayed and was gonna miss my connecting flight in Canada so they put me on delta. Straight flight which was good but their services hasn't changed much. No improvement.

title: Ancient beauty
text: Great sight seeing the ancient gods. It's on a mountain top hence a great sight of the whole city. Lots of restaurants around the area with good food and good prices. Just be prepared for lots of tourists.

title: Magnificent
text: I did not go inside because I didn't meet outfit code, but from the outside,it was beautiful. It is one huge mosque with such beautiful designs. It's a beauty on its own.

title: Great experience
text: We had a great tour guide that took us into the town of old Jaffa. We started the tour from the clock tower and made our way into the old town. THE TOUR WAS TOTALLY FREE!!! You just gave a tip after the tour if you wish to, which is recommended. Overall it was a beautiful learning experience

title: Great history
text: Went to Egypt under Jakarda tours. It was very informative and interesting trip to embark on. The history behind the pyramids are great. The private tour is budget friendly and very convenient. The sunset at the pyramid restaurant was amazing. Food was actually very cheap around the area.

title: Great place
text: A day trip from montegobay, by the time we got there it was pouring. I didn't enjoy the place like I wanted but when the rain finally stopped, we got the chance to see a beautiful sunset. The natural pool was awesome, seeing people dive from the highest cliff was quiet scary. The staff are friendly and the bathrooms were very neat.
place: Day-Trip to Rick's Cafe from Montego Bay

title: Excellent services
text: I had my 30th birthday party at ridge royal hotel. Great food, great customer services, the staff were very nice and welcoming. Chef Anthony exceeded my expectations with the food. Great set up, they basically took care of everything from beginning to end. I will recommend the place for any occasion at any day.

title: Phenomenal
text: Very friendly people. Phenomenal way of living. Even a three year old can swim in the big water body. It's cheaper to go and in groups. We took a bike ride to the water and a boat ride to the village. A round trip cost about 55gh per person but 20gh if in a group of 10. It's about 2hrs drive from takoradi. There are side attractions on the way. It was a day well spent. Oh, and don't forget to make a donation to the locals. It could be cash or in kind.

title: Great experience
text: Riding on the horse in the ocean was great. It just wasn't lengthy. We were in and out real fast. They took us in groups of about 10 persons per ocean trip. We had the opportunity to ride the horses on the mountain top but that was more like a training. I'd rather we spent more time in the ocean.
place: CHUKKA Ocean Outpost at Sandy Bay

title: Beautiful experience
text: This was one of the best. I made a few friends. The water was very calm and great for relaxation and reflection. The history behind the name of the river was not what I expected tho, but I still have an excellent bamboo ride.

title: Great experience
text: The hotel has the best staff. Gabby at the front desk was extremely kind are always ready to help. Denika,one of the staff was very nice and always ready to assist. Room service was great and free access to the doctor's cave beach, free transportation to and from the airport. Good food, great entertainment at night. It was a beautiful experience. I'll definitely recommend the resort to friends and family.

title: Beautiful experience
text: This is the place to be to see the sunset. I saw one of the most beautiful and adventurous cliff dive ever!! Beautiful place, beautiful waters,the bar was great and oh, great music.

title: Excellent Private Tour
text: Ahmed was incredibly nice to me. He actually goes above and beyond to make his clients happy. My short stay in Cairo was incredible thanks to Ahmed.

title: Great Guide
text: She's very knowledgeable with a deep understanding. Doing the Tel Aviv city tour with her just brought a lot of history to live. The best tour guide in Tel Aviv. Highly recommended.
